boardgame.name: Keyper
boardgame.description: Keyper is a game with high player interaction for two to four players played over four rounds. Each round represents a season: spring, summer, autumn, and finally winter._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player starts the game with their own village board, a mini keyp board, 12 village tiles, a keyper (waving meeple) in their player color, and a team of eight multi-colored keyples, including two white keyples. Each differently colored keyple is a specialist in one activity: the brown keyper is a woodsman, the black keyple is a miner, the orange keyple a clay worker, etc. The white keyples are generalists who can represent any other color._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Keyper is a worker placement game. (Keyper is the eighth new title in the medieval Key series of games, with Keydom, the second in the series being widely recognized as the first of the worker placement genre of games.) What makes Keyper special is that when one player places a keyple on a country board, another player can join them with a matching colored keyple on the first player's turn to the benefit of both players. In this way, some players are likely to have played all their keyples before others. All keyples have the potential to work twice. If a player has played all of their keyples, but another player still has some, then on their turn, the player with no remaining keyples can lay down one or more keyples on the country board they have claimed or in their village board to secure additional resources or actions. It can therefore be doubly beneficial to co-operate with your fellow players, although Keyper is not a co-operative game in the usual sense of the term._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The country boards are also noteworthy, in that they can be manipulated and folded at the beginning of summer, autumn, and winter to show one of four different permutations of fields for that season. A player will chose the one to suit their strategy, often hoping that another player will complement their choice. Certain fields on the country boards are available only in certain seasons, e.g., raw materials can be upgraded to finished goods only in spring and summer, after which you can only convert using tiles in your own village. Gem mining occurs only in autumn and winter._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A player's strategy is likely to be influenced by which (seeded) spring country tiles they acquire and by the particular colored keyples they have available in the later seasons. Different combinations will encourage a player to develop their farm or village, help with their shipping or mining activities, and prepare for the seasonal fairs. Players constantly need to evaluate whether or not to join other players, when to claim a country board, whether to play on their own or another player's country board, when to use their own village, and whether to create a large or small team of keyples for the following season. The winner is the player to gain the most points, usually through pursuing at least a couple of the different strategies._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In addition to the theme and mechanisms, Keyper has similar traits to the earlier Key games: Game actions are positive and constructive, not destructive; player interaction is through the game mechanisms not direct, and like Keyflower, the previous game in the series, there is a lot of player interaction._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A special English-language Kickstarter edition of Keyper with _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;character_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; keyples and keypers will also be released._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Episode 13 - We Are Super Hip! (Twilight Imperium IV, Clans of Caledonia, Charterstone, and more!)

Episode 46 - Birds of a Feather Blitz Together
Episode 75 :: 3 Year Anniversary + Man vs Meeple Interview

listing.notes: EU-citizens who have access to free wire transfer, but wanna pay with PayPal instead, have to pay the fee.

I am offering the Keyper: Character Edition, which was offered in the 2016 Kickstarter Project. https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/555694524/keyper-character-edition The game is complete (including the 36 Character meeples instead of regular meeples, as well as the 8 exclusive Character Edition country tiles). All components are in excellent condition, as is the box (minimal wear and tear, if at all). The game has been played once. As per BGG rules, it has to be listed as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Very Good_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, although I would say it is closer to _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Like New_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. Neither this edition nor the Character meeples and/or the special tiles separately will see retail in this EXCLUSIVE KICKSTARTER VERSION. Payment: - Bank transfer to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC in advance (free of charge) - Paypal (add 3,- Euro to cover the fees. This should be the first choice for non-EU customers.) I will always ship insured (tracking number included): Germany: 5,89 (via Hermes) EU: 15,99€ (via DHL) Rest of the world: Please contact me before purchasing an item to clarify the shipping costs.

I sell my Game _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Keyper_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Character Edition, multilingual (includes German and Englisch Rules) + Kickstarter Stretch Goals + special Kick Starter edition, 36 specially designed character _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;keyples_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; (wooden meeples) + six additional ‘village’ tiles played once. MINT Condition, no wear IBAN or PayPal payment appreciated (IBAN and PayPal Friends without extra costs, Regular PayPal within EU +3€, EX-EU 5€) The Package is insured and shipped after payment Tracking No. is provided. ask for Shipment: 4Kg I am a trusted BG-Geek! see my ratings and profile. If you have any Questions send me a Geekmail

Never played: I punched all the chits to set it up and learn the rules, but didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t put it at the table. After reading the rules, I realized it is too heavy and abstract for my tastes. So everything is in perfect condition, the box is in great condition. Both english and german rules are included. This is the characters edition with the painted meeples and extra tiles. Will ship with thick layers of bubble wrap (Philibert-style box).

Opened, punched but unplayed rare special limited edition Character edition with unique painted meeples and one of a kind promo tiles that only come with the limited edition. Like new, no dings or dents anywhere. Shipping is $14 medium flat rate box. If you would like me to ship it in an extra large box for added protection, it is $18. I will invoice you for $18 but if you want the $14 option just paypal me the $4 less. **I am not responsible for postal damage. I take picture of my rare items before sending to back up my condition notes before shipping. If you would like added insurance, you must contact me and purchase that separately. My feedback on here speaks for itself! Enjoy the rare game.
